website_summaries.verdict: This extra-spacious kegerator makes it easy to store and serve three different beers.
pros: While this is one of the more expensive kegerators available, it offers a great way to store up to three different types of beers and features a dual-gauge CO2 regulator for keeping each beer at its appropriate pressure
All necessary hardware is included, and the interior can hold three five-gallon kegs
cons: A few customers received broken parts

customer_reviews.title: Love this! We ordered for our office and installed ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We ordered for our office and installed it today. We had it custom installed under our new countertops in our office bar and it looks fantastic. I had to go to lowes to by 2.5" 1/4 20 screws because the screws were too long for our counter tops but that's about the most complicated portion of the install. I was very worried about installing this because I've never done anything remotely close to it before however the instructions were simple and the setup was SUPER easy, even for a 1st-timer like me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leviticus the Bold

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, convertible, quiet, and fits more than expected! :)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Bought it for boyfriend’s birthday. Read a lot of reviews before making the purchase & we’re really happy with the outcome. A lot of parts weren’t needed because we ended up using it as a commercial beer kegarator. Either way, the instructions were "barney style" with photos. Super easy setup. We were able to fit a 7 & 5 gallon commercial keg, along with the Co2 bottle in the kegerator. As far as how loud it may get, you WILL NOT notice it via sound.
customer_reviews.author: MariGnav

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup for the homebrewer.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to set up, simplistic in design. Components are of a good quality and adaptable to a number of individual setup preferences. I opted for Cornelius kegs vice the commercial keg setup, so once I cut the lines, added in quick release connectors, tightened the fittings (oops) and re-pressurized the system all worked extremely well. Documentation was easy to follow and lays out a number of setups. If you have any experience with homebrew kegging at all you'll find this easy. I opted to change out the faucets to Perlick style to reduce cleaning, everything was a snap. Nice, compact, easy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Good Except for Operator Error
customer_reviews.text: I made a few rookie mistakes when I purchased this Kegco. I didn't note that it was a home brew model, which would be fine if I did home brew. But I wanted commercial. Thus, I had to go out and buy $80 worth of connecting hardware. My suggestion would be to make the difference more clear in online sales information. It also took me awhile to adjust co2 correctly, thus compromising some beer early on. That too was operator error. But overall I'm pretty satisfied. Oh, and I also received prompt assistance from the merchant when I pointed out a broken home brew coupler.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sealing Rings Defect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased, 3-tap kegerator. Within 9 months two out of the three tap metal circular sealing rings cracked (where you connect the tap to the stalk). Well, when this happens your tap becomes loose and beer everywhere. Lost one keg and CO2 waste to this defect and almost another, heard the hissing and caught it in time. Support was good however they should have sent me a whole new tower. Sent me two new rings however a defect like this just wastes money and beer. It's obviously a defect, I don't run much pressure through the lines. It's still in use however since purchased an Edgestar and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: KirkK

customer_reviews.title: Strange mix of accessories...had to buy more crap to get it working. Not good for $940!
customer_reviews.text: The triple tap kegerator looks the part and allows for 3 x corny/pepsi ball lock kegs, which is why I bought it. Very stratnge then that the beer line included (pre-attached to the taps) dont have ball lock disconnects, instead having three sankey coupler disconnects. But the kit comes with ball lock disconnects which are'nt compatible with the sankey fittings. Weird. Also, the beer line is only 3' long, usually this would be 10' to prevent foaming etc. So right off that bat, that all needs replacing. Then there was a weird mix of gas disconnects so I had to buy a couple more. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Hoses are extra long and you have to kind of shove them in around the kegs when you have 3 inside. Also you have to strategically place kegs to be able to get 3 in and the door closed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Megard

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for about 14 months, so just over the warranty period when I had the left tap on the tower come undone from the tower. Emailed support and they were nice enough to give me a free replacement tower even though I was 2 months over the manufacturer warranty. Would definitely recommend buying KegCo products! I have been extremely pleased with all the ones I’ve purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Bogdanovich

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with the quality of the unit and the customer service. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lee Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and looks great. Enough room for a half keg and a pony keg at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald H.

customer_reviews.title: Missing items and delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: Missing couplers for the kegerator, came damaged like it had been dropped. Had to purchase hardware to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: stan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kegerator. Was missing a few fittings for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic kegerator. Was missing a few fittings for my ball lock keg so it took a month to get fully setup.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Heuse

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I aas worried about this keeping the keg cold outside, but have not had any issues l, beer is ice cold!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda navarro

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL INSIDE FOR 3 KEGS
customer_reviews.text: It does Not Fit 3 of the smallest kegs they make
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH LEONE

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy.. does not come assembled, instructions are a little confusing when it comes to ball lock kegs, but otherwise, good product
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D

customer_reviews.title: Great for beer lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Great for people who like to home brew or who enjoy beer on tap.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Our tap was not included in the box
customer_reviews.text: I repeat, Our tap was not included in the box
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Goeppinger

customer_reviews.title: Got it broken
customer_reviews.text: Broken parts delivered, plus very heavy to deal with it ...
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Jeman

customer_reviews.title: wonderful item!
customer_reviews.text: I have soda water on one side (kids love to make their own sodas the old fashion way), and of course the good stuff on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: rogwabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest install I've had in our new home. The instructions are simple and easy to follow. The included pieces are solid and look like they will hold up for a long time. When I priced out building my own verses this Kegerator I went ahead and bought it. It isn't in the description, but if you are using a commercial keg make sure you order the appropriate adapter for your keg type.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Almost, but not quite.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've spent a few weeks with the homebrew kegerator, I wish I would have just built one. For the price, it's nice. However, the lines are entirely incorrect for balancing and the temperature control is no where near consistent. I'm glad it can reach below 0C/32f but the range is not to spec. The door thermometer I added reads 42, but the beer freezes in the tower. Yes, the thermometer is accurate. I've added a temp controller to adjust the accuracy, but honestly for the cost go elsewhere. I'm not disappointment enough to send it back, but I would look elsewhere next time.
customer_reviews.author: contrascout

customer_reviews.title: Only chills to 42 degrees
customer_reviews.text: The kegerator is only cooling to 42 degrees at max. Otherwise it’s working out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kegco Keg Dispenser
product_meta.description: Size:3 Faucet without Kegs| Color:Stainless SteelDon't limit yourself to brewing just one kind of beer at a time! With Kenco's HBK209S-3 Triple Faucet Kegerator, you can serve up to three different beers simultaneously without compromising freshness or flavor. This keg cooler has ample space to accommodate up to three 5 gallon ball lock kegs, and the three-faucet tower and complete ball lock dispense system allows you to tap and serve from all three kegs at the same time. Whether you're trying to experiment with a wide range of recipes or just want a few different options available for your friends and family, this HBK209S-3 is a great way to serve a variety of beers straight from the tap while enhancing their optimum flavor, freshness, and carbonation. The complete three-product direct draw kit comes with everything you'll need for your brand new Kegerator, including ball lock keg couplers, corrosion-resistant red aluminum CO2 cylinder, dual gauge regulator with 3-way air distributor, and polished stainless steel draft tower. All you'll need to do is fill the CO2 tank and provide the kegs of beer! This kegerator's black cabinet is fitted with a durable and stylish stainless steel door that is sure to look great with your existing decor. A dishwasher-safe plastic drip tray makes clean-up easy, while the four locking casters give you the option to easily move the Kegerator into nearly any room of your home. To help ensure that you'll be enjoying fresh-tasting homebrew beer from your Kegerator for years to come, we've designed this unit with a stainless steel plate on the bottom to evenly distribute the weight of your kegs, helping to prevent damage to the lining.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES COMPLETE KEG TAPPING KIT: All of the necessary equipment from ball lock keg couplers down to washers and fittings has been included with this homebrew kegerator - all you'll need to do is provide the kegs of beer! Additionally, we've upgraded some of the items in this kit to their premium quality versions at no additional cost to you, like the corrosion-resistant CO2 tank, premium dual gauge regulator, and stainless steel draft beer tower. This adds a value of $35 to your unit!

LARGE INTERIOR: Store and dispense up to three ball lock Pepsi kegs at a time in this keg cooler's spacious interior. When you aren't using it to dispense delicious home-brew, it can be easily converted into an all-refrigerator to provide additional refrigerated storage space for parties and special events. Each unit includes two adjustable shelves that can be spaced far enough apart to hold gallon jugs or 2-liter bottles.

SLEEK AND STYLISH DESIGN: The black cabinet of this kegerator is fitted with a stainless steel door that is not only stylish but highly durable. Continued maintenance is easy thanks to a removable dishwasher safe plastic drip tray on top that collects drips and spills for fast clean-up. A chrome guard rail helps prevent glasses from being knocked off. Four locking casters allow you to move the unit from place to place for game day, poker night, holidays, and everyday use.

POWERFUL AND ENERGY EFFICIENT COOLING TECHNOLOGY: A 25% more energy efficient design delivers powerful cooling while minimizing your impact on the environment - and your wallet! To help ensure that your beer is being dispensed at its ideal temperature, thermostatic temperature control keeps the internal temperature in the range of 35 degrees Fahrenheit to 42 degrees Fahrenheit. To adjust the temperature, you can easily access the mechanical temperature control at the back of the unit.

LONG-LASTING DURABILITY: This CSA listed unit measures 33.25" H x 24" W x 25" D and has been specially designed to provide reliable durability and long-lasting performance. A stainless steel plate at the bottom of the cooler ensures that the weight of your kegs is evenly distributed so that the interior lining does not get damaged, allowing this keg cooler to keep your kegs cool for a long time to come. All of the dispensing accessories are UL recognized components.
